amendment.description: To require the United States Interagency Council on Homelessness to submit a report on improving health and housing outcomes for chronically homeless individuals, individuals with behavioral health conditions, and children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3921 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3921 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Franken to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2814-2815) To require the United States Interagency Council on Homelessness to submit a report on improving health and housing outcomes for chronically homeless individuals, individuals with behavioral health conditions, and children.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3921 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Franken to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3921 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
